function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Informal textual document preparation may not effectively describe identified needs, leading to misalignment with user requirements.","Impact":"Misaligned ontology with user's needs and expectations, potential for ineffective ontology development or evolution.","Mitigation":"Include multiple perspectives in the documentation process, engage with users for feedback and validation.","Technologies":"Collaborative document editing tools, user feedback and validation platforms.","People":"Ontology developers, stakeholders, users.","Owner":"Ontology developers, project managers."},{"Description":"Inadequate evaluation of ontology quality may lead to inconsistent or unusable ontologies.","Impact":"Inconsistent or unusable ontologies that do not accurately represent domain knowledge.","Mitigation":"Establish clear evaluation criteria, involve domain experts, conduct thorough testing and validation.","Technologies":"Ontology quality evaluation tools, testing and validation platforms.","People":"Ontology developers, domain experts.","Owner":"Ontology developers, project managers."},{"Description":"Inadequate maintenance and adaptation of ontology to new requirements may lead to outdated or ineffective representation of domain knowledge.","Impact":"Outdated or ineffective ontologies that do not reflect current domain knowledge.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and updates, proactive adaptation to new requirements, continuous evaluation and improvement.","Technologies":"Version control systems, automated update tools, continuous integration platforms.","People":"Ontology developers, domain experts, project managers.","Owner":"Ontology developers, project managers."}]}
